ygData.subject: Re: My weapon setup, should i change it?
ygData.msgSnippet: One problem with this combo....Painbringer is a Warrior Only weapon and Ghoulsbane is a Paladin only weapon. Sorry. Jynxx ... From: Dean Boyle
ygData.messageBody:
One problem with this combo....Painbringer is a Warrior Only weapon and
Ghoulsbane is a Paladin only weapon. Sorry.

Jynxx

From: Dean Boyle <gino_14@...>

Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] My weapon setup, should i change it?
